rows.label: fev11_400_150_msg0001
rows.name: Everyone, I'm back.

rows.label: fev11_400_150_msg0002
rows.name:
Hey, Hugo.
Did the battlefield survey go alright?

rows.label: fev11_400_150_msg0003
rows.name: Yes, thank you. It was very worthwhile.

rows.label: fev11_400_150_msg0004
rows.name: Huh? You look a little down.

rows.label: fev11_400_150_msg0005
rows.name: No, I'm just a bit tired, that's all.

rows.label: fev11_400_150_msg0006
rows.name:
That's understandable.
The Shiyan remnants were putting
up a hell of a fight...

rows.label: fev11_400_150_msg0007
rows.name: The battlefield was a horrifying sight.

rows.label: fev11_400_150_msg0008
rows.name:
The people of Shiya are Metsu's victims,
too, and yet we have to fight them.

rows.label: fev11_400_150_msg0009
rows.name: It is regrettable.

rows.label: fev11_400_150_msg0010
rows.name: I want to put an end to this soon.

rows.label: fev11_400_150_msg0011
rows.name:
While you were gone, they finished
repairing Lett Bridge and we figured out
where to go next. Let's get moving.

rows.label: fev11_400_150_msg0012
rows.name:
You know where you're going?
You figured out Metsu's target?

rows.label: fev11_400_150_msg0013
rows.name:
I suspected as much...
He's targeting Iira.
The capital, to be precise.

rows.label: fev11_400_150_msg0014
rows.name: Are you sure about that information?

rows.label: fev11_400_150_msg0015
rows.name:
It's highly accurate.
It's from the Holy See.

rows.label: fev11_400_150_msg0016
rows.name:
From the Deacon Cardinal?
Then I suppose there's no room for doubt.

rows.label: fev11_400_150_msg0017
rows.name: The capital... that's a long trip.

rows.label: fev11_400_150_msg0018
rows.name:
Yeah. It's over Lett Bridge
and past the Dannagh Desert.

rows.label: fev11_400_150_msg0019
rows.name:
Sata, what about you?
You can stay here if you want.

rows.label: fev11_400_150_msg0020
rows.name:
Good idea. I can have my
steward look after Satahiko.

rows.label: fev11_400_150_msg0021
rows.name: I'm going with you.

rows.label: fev11_400_150_msg0022
rows.name:
Why? We'll have to fight
Metsu eventually.
This journey is dangerous.

rows.label: fev11_400_150_msg0023
rows.name: I said I'm going with you!

rows.label: fev11_400_150_msg0024
rows.name: Oh, Satahiko...

rows.label: fev11_400_150_msg0026
rows.name: What should we do?

rows.label: fev11_400_150_msg0027
rows.name:
In times like these,
nowhere is truly safe.

rows.label: fev11_400_150_msg0028
rows.name: He might actually be better off with us.

rows.label: fev11_400_150_msg0029
rows.name:
Geez... If I said no now,
I'd look like the bad guy.

rows.label: fev11_400_150_msg0030
rows.name:
Fine.
We'll all go to the capital together.

rows.label: fev11_400_150_msg0031
rows.name: Are you sure about this, Satahiko?

rows.label: fev11_400_150_msg0101
rows.name:
By the way, Hugo.
I have a proposal...

rows.label: fev11_400_150_msg0102
rows.name: What is it?

rows.label: fev11_400_150_msg0103
rows.name:
I was thinking yesterday,
while training with Laura...

rows.label: fev11_400_150_msg0104
rows.name:
I think we could get stronger if we
fought like Laura's team,
passing our weapons back and forth.

rows.label: fev11_400_150_msg0105
rows.name: Wanna try it?

rows.label: fev11_400_150_msg0107
rows.name: It sounds like it's worth a shot.

rows.label: fev11_400_150_msg0108
rows.name:
Laura fights using both Shin's
and Kasumi's weapons...

rows.label: fev11_400_150_msg0109
rows.name:
That's what makes
her arts so powerful.

rows.label: fev11_400_150_msg0110
rows.name:
We should follow her example,
especially with the fight against
the Heaven's Holy Grail coming up.

rows.label: fev11_400_150_msg0111
rows.name: Right?

rows.label: fev11_400_150_msg0112
rows.name:
Hikari, I'm going to borrow
your weapon to fight.

rows.label: fev11_400_150_msg0113
rows.name: Alright?

rows.label: fev11_400_150_msg0114
rows.name: Go ahead.

rows.label: fev11_400_150_msg0115
rows.name:
But I don't think you'll be able
to do it as well as those three,
will you?

rows.label: fev11_400_150_msg0116
rows.name:
You're being awfully
humble today, Hikari.

rows.label: fev11_400_150_msg0117
rows.name: That's not what I meant, but...

rows.label: fev11_400_150_msg0118
rows.name:
Alright, fine.
I'll get it perfect on the first try.

rows.label: fev11_400_150_msg0119
rows.name: Now that's the Hikari I know.

rows.label: fev11_400_150_msg0120
rows.name:
Kagutsuchi and Wadatsumi...
we might be a bit clumsy at first,
but please bear with us.

rows.label: fev11_400_150_msg0121
rows.name: As you will.

rows.label: fev11_400_150_msg0122
rows.name:
I will match your movements,
no matter what,
Your Majesty.

rows.label: fev11_400_150_msg0123
rows.name: Hehe... Very reassuring.

rows.label: fev11_400_150_msg0124
rows.name: Everyone, let's hurry up and go!

rows.label: fev11_400_150_msg0125
rows.name: Right, coming.

rows.label: fev11_400_150_msg0126
rows.name: Alright, let's head to the capital.

rows.label: fev11_400_150_msg0127
rows.name: Couldn't you take him with you?
